name: Ashley Clark: The Secrets of the Ancient Temple
description: Detective Ashley Clark investigates a case in a provincial town. An accident happens in closed zoo. Zoo employee was killed by animal. At first glance - nothing unusual, but the heroine realizes that it was not an accident. Something very strange occur in zoo.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 3400 Series, GeForce 205 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound
